languages.text: "Я смотрю, мое появление тебя не радует. Хорошо". {n}Друкари мерзко улыбается, после чего оглядывается вокруг.{/n} "Ты неплохо обустроился в Прорве. Держал здесь то, что не решался тащить в шпиль Бури? Как, полагаю, досадно бросать сейчас все это, улепетывая от гнева культа..."

"My presence offends you, I see? Good." {n}Marazhai sneers and looks around.{/n} "You have made yourself quite comfortable here in the Chasm. Is this where you have kept the things that you dared not bring to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? It must be vexing, having to abandon it all as you flee the Cult's wrath..."
languages.original_text: "Я смотрю, мое появление тебя не радует. Хорошо". {n}Друкари мерзко улыбается, после чего оглядывается вокруг.{/n} "Ты неплохо обустроился в Прорве. Держал здесь то, что не решался тащить в шпиль Бури? Как, полагаю, досадно бросать сейчас все это, улепетывая от гнева культа..."

traits.locale_text: "I see my new presence does not make you happy. Good." {n}Marazhai smiles nastily and looks around.{/n} "You have made yourself quite comfortable in the Chasm. Did you keep here what you dared not bring to the spire of Tempest? It must be vexing, having to abandon it all as you flee the cult's wrath..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

Did you keep here what you dared not bring to the spire of Tempest? It must be vexing, having to abandon it all as you flee the cult's wrath..."

Is this where you have kept the things that you dared not bring to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? It must be vexing, having to abandon it all as you flee the Cult's wrath..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺がいることが不満みたいだな？嬉しいぜ」{n}マラズハイは意地悪そうに微笑み、周囲を見回す。{/n}「裂け目で快適に過ごしているようだな。陰謀団〈略奪の嵐〉の尖塔に持ち込む勇気がなかったものを保管している場所がここか？魔女団の怒りから逃れるため、すべてを捨てなければならないのは辛いだろう…」
languages.original_text: "My presence offends you, I see? Good." {n}Marazhai sneers and looks around.{/n} "You have made yourself quite comfortable here in the Chasm. Is this where you have kept the things that you dared not bring to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? It must be vexing, having to abandon it all as you flee the Cult's wrath..."

traits.locale_text: 「俺がいることが不満みたいだな？嬉しいぜ」{n}マラズハイは意地悪そうに微笑み、周囲を見回す。{/n}「裂け目で快適に過ごしているようだな。陰謀団〈略奪の嵐〉の尖塔に持ち込む勇気がなかったものを保管している場所がここか？魔女団の怒りから逃れるため、すべてを捨てなければならないのは辛いだろう…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我在这里你好像不太满意，是吧？那就好。”{n}玛拉斋冷笑一声，环顾四周。{/n}“不过，你在裂隙里呆得倒是挺舒服的。那些你不敢带到尖塔里的东西，是不是都放在这里了？为了躲避巫灵教派的怒火，你不得不放弃眼下的一切，这肯定相当让人恼火吧……”
languages.original_text: "My presence offends you, I see? Good." {n}Marazhai sneers and looks around.{/n} "You have made yourself quite comfortable here in the Chasm. Is this where you have kept the things that you dared not bring to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? It must be vexing, having to abandon it all as you flee the Cult's wrath..."

traits.locale_text: “看得出来，我现在的样子让你很不高兴，我很满意。”{n}玛拉斋露出了凶狠的笑容，环顾四周。{/n}“不过，你在裂隙里呆得倒是挺舒服的。那些你不敢带到尖塔里的东西，是不是都留在了这里？为了躲避巫灵教派的怒火，你不得不放弃眼下的一切，这肯定相当让人恼火吧……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Te ofende mi presencia? Me alegro». {n}Marazhai sonríe con malicia y mira a su alrededor.{/n} «Por lo visto te has acomodado en el Abismo. ¿Guardas aquí lo que no te atreves a traer a la Torre de la Tempestad Asoladora? Debe de ser frustrante tener que abandonarlo todo para huir de la ira del culto...».
languages.original_text: "My presence offends you, I see? Good." {n}Marazhai sneers and looks around.{/n} "You have made yourself quite comfortable here in the Chasm. Is this where you have kept the things that you dared not bring to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? It must be vexing, having to abandon it all as you flee the Cult's wrath..."

traits.locale_text: «Veo que mi nueva presencia no le hace feliz. Me alegro». {n}Marazhai sonríe con malicia y mira a su alrededor.{/n} «Por lo visto te has acomodado en el Abismo. ¿Guardas aquí lo que no te atreves a traer a la Torre de la Tempestad? Debe de ser un incordio tener que abandonarlo todo mientras huyes de la ira del culto...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Gegenwart beleidigt Euch, wie ich sehe? Gut." {n}Marazhai lächelt spöttisch und sieht sich um.{/n} "Ihr habt es Euch hier in der Kluft ja richtig gemütlich gemacht. Bewahrt Ihr hier die Dinge auf, die Ihr nicht zum Turm des Sturms zu bringen gewagt habt? Es muss ärgerlich sein, auf der Fluch vor dem Zorn des Kults alles aufzugeben ..."
languages.original_text: "My presence offends you, I see? Good." {n}Marazhai sneers and looks around.{/n} "You have made yourself quite comfortable here in the Chasm. Is this where you have kept the things that you dared not bring to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? It must be vexing, having to abandon it all as you flee the Cult's wrath..."

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich sehe, macht meine neue Präsenz Euch nicht glücklich. Gut." {n}Marazhai grinst böse und sieht sich um.{/n} "Ihr habt es Euch in der Kluft ja richtig gemütlich gemacht. Hebt Ihr hier auf, was Ihr nicht gewagt habt, in den Turm des Sturms zu bringen? Es muss ärgerlich sein, auf der Fluch vor dem Zorn des Kults alles aufzugeben ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Il semblerait que ma présence vous offense ? Tant mieux. » {n}Marazhai affiche un sourire effronté tout en observant les alentours.{/n} « Je vois que vous avez pris vos aises dans l'Abîme. Est-ce là que vous gardez tout ce que vous n'avez pas osé rapporter dans la tour de la Tempête ravageuse ? Comme ce doit être difficile de devoir tout laisser derrière vous pour pouvoir échapper au courroux du Culte... »
languages.original_text: "My presence offends you, I see? Good." {n}Marazhai sneers and looks around.{/n} "You have made yourself quite comfortable here in the Chasm. Is this where you have kept the things that you dared not bring to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? It must be vexing, having to abandon it all as you flee the Cult's wrath..."

traits.locale_text: « Il semblerait que ma présence vous offense ? Tant mieux. » {n}Marazhai affiche un sourire effronté tout en observant les alentours.{/n} « Je vois que vous avez pris vos aises dans l'Abîme. Est-ce là que vous gardez tout ce que vous n'avez pas osé rapporter dans la tour de la Tempête ravageuse ? Comme ce doit être difficile de devoir tout laisser derrière vous pour pouvoir échapper au courroux du Culte... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Görüyorum ki mevcudiyetim ağırına gidiyor. Güzel." {n}Marazhai, burun kıvırıp etrafa bakınıyor.{/n} "Yarık'ta kendine bayağı konforlu bir alan yaratmışsın. Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'ne getirme cüreti gösteremediğin şeyleri burada mı tutuyordun? Tarikat'ın gazabından kaçmak için hepsini terk etmek zorunda kalmak, can sıkıcı olmalı."
languages.original_text: "My presence offends you, I see? Good." {n}Marazhai sneers and looks around.{/n} "You have made yourself quite comfortable here in the Chasm. Is this where you have kept the things that you dared not bring to the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? It must be vexing, having to abandon it all as you flee the Cult's wrath..."

traits.locale_text: "Görüyorum ki mevcudiyetim ağırına gidiyor. Güzel." {n}Marazhai burun kıvırıyor ve etrafa bakınıyor.{/n} "Yarık'ta kendine bayağı konforlu bir alan yaratmışsın. Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'ne getirme cüreti gösteremediğin şeyleri burada mı tutuyordun? Tarikat'ın gazabından kaçmak için hepsini terk etmek zorunda kalmak can sıkıcı olmalı."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
